data.text:
McQueen, congratulations! 
That race…! It was amazing!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I finally won the Tennō Shō!! Now I can show 
this plaque to the Mejiro Family!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I finally won the Tennō Shō!! Now I can show 
<story>this plaque to the Mejiro Family!!

data.text:
I was shocked by 
Mejiro McQueen's display of joy.
data.processed:
<story>I was shocked by 
<story>Mejiro McQueen's display of joy.

data.text:
I guess it's because the immense amount of pressure that she had 
on her to win has finally been lifted.
data.processed:
<story>I guess it's because the immense amount of pressure that she had 
<story>on her to win has finally been lifted.

data.text:
I'm sorry, I may have gotten a little carried away. 
But I'm just so happy.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, I may have gotten a little carried away. 
<story>But I'm just so happy.

data.text:
And the only reason I was able to achieve 
this was because of you, Trainer-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>And the only reason I was able to achieve 
<story>this was because of you, Trainer-san.

data.text:
You devoted everything for me, 
and for that I am grateful.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>You devoted everything for me, 
<story>and for that I am grateful.

data.text:
I should be thanking you. Despite being inexperienced, you still 
followed my orders. And in the end, you gave me the best present 
possible, this amazing victory.
data.processed:
<story>I should be thanking you. Despite being inexperienced, you still 
<story>followed my orders. And in the end, you gave me the best present 
<story>possible, this amazing victory.

data.text:
…But if I were to say that, she'd get upset and say “please 
have a bit more confidence in yourself.”

choices.text: Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!
choices.processed: <size=43>Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!</size>

choices.text: Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!
choices.processed: <size=43>Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!</size>

data.processed:
<story>…But if I were to say that, she'd get upset and say “please 
<story>have a bit more confidence in yourself.”

data.text:
Hehe, we'll have many more 
victories from now on, I'm sure of it!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, we'll have many more 
<story>victories from now on, I'm sure of it!

data.text:
Well, it's almost time for the Winning Live. I need to show my 
appreciation to everyone that came out to support me!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Well, it's almost time for the Winning Live. I need to show my 
<story>appreciation to everyone that came out to support me!
